CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(VROI_Analysis_ID__c),HYPERLINK("https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/simplesamlphp-sp/www/module.php/core/as_login.php?AuthId=UjG34s6qnjYJY46AgSJPU&ReturnTo=https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/api/saml/login?redirect=https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/customer/ui/SalesUI/dashboard.html?opportunity_id="&Id&"&v_id_field="& VROI_Analysis_ID__c ,"Click Here to Create BVA Analysis"), HYPERLINK("https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/simplesamlphp-sp/www/module.php/core/as_login.php?AuthId=UjG34s6qnjYJY46AgSJPU&ReturnTo=https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/api/saml/login?redirect=https://www.visualize-roi.com/vr/api/salesForce/flowsalesforce/id/"& VROI_Analysis_ID__c &"/vt//sfid/"&Id&"/redirect/newui/v_id_field/VROI_Analysis_ID__c", "Click Here to Update BVA Analysis"))
CustomField.label: VROI BVA Analysis
